item.title: How do I make wildy?
item.dc:creator: @jman7 jman7
item.description:
@jman7 wrote:

public boolean isInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY) {
if ((coordY >= 3523) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392)
&& (coordX >= 2942) || absX >= 3220 && absX <= 3299 && absY >= 3520 && absY <=3548 || absX >= 2377 && absX <= 2429 && absY >= 3070 && absY <=3143 || absX >= 2250 && absX <= 2296 && absY >= 4676 && absY <=4715) {
return true;
}
if ((coordY >= 3512) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392)
&& (coordX >= 2942)) {
return true;
}
}
return false;
}
edit it a little bit from that and see hwta you get, i dint fix any bracket errors just the main error that i see

item.title: How do I make wildy?
item.dc:creator: @de_dust89 de dust89
item.description:
@de_dust89 wrote:

Well I am making a Bounty Hunter, and I seem to have everything done, except for the most important part…=O I cant attack anyone in there. (it is a safe zone.) So I was wondering if anyone can explain to me, how do i make the code below, into a box, using coords. or a link to a tutorial. thanks =\

	public boolean isInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) {
		if (Type == 1) {
			if ((coordY >= 3523) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392)
					&& (coordX >= 2942) || absX >= 3220 && absX <= 3299 && absY >= 3520 && absY <=3548 || absX >= 2377 && absX <= 2429 && absY >= 3070 && absY <=3143 || absX >= 2250 && absX <= 2296 && absY >= 4676 && absY <=4715) {
				return true;
			}
		} else if (Type == 2) {
			if ((coordY >= 3512) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392)
					&& (coordX >= 2942)) {
				return true;
			}
		} else if (Type == 3) {
			if ((coordY >= 9408) && (coordY <= 9469) && (coordX <= 2688)
					&& (coordX >= 2750)) {
				return true;
			}
		}
		return false;
	}

EDIT:I want you guys to focus on this part:

		} else if (Type == 3) {
			if ((coordY >= 9408) && (coordY <= 9469) && (coordX <= 2688)
					&& (coordX >= 2750)) {
				return true;

I made it so the bottom left hand corners coords is the first coordy and first coordx, and so that the top right hand corner, is the second coordy and second coordx. i did that, and still does not let me attack anyone, or give me the attack option in the bounty hunter area…anyone know what i should change it to?

Read full topic
